titles.title: A resolution waiving certain points of order against consideration of the bill (H.R. 2763) making appropriations for the Departments of Commerce, Justice, and State, the Judiciary, and related agencies for the fiscal year ending September 30, 1988, and for other purposes.

action.text: House Committee on Rules Reported an Original Measure. Report No: 100-196.

bill.summary: 6/29/1987--Introduced. Waives points of order against the consideration of H.R. 2763 (Departments of Commerce, Justice, and State, the Judiciary, and related agencies appropriations).
